name: Giovannis's Mansion
description:
Our project for the Godot Wildjam 2

You are playing our little fellow called Bob, who got trapped in some kind of mysterious dungeon full moveable walls, secrets and a wrath.
Everything (except parts of the used tilemap) where created from srcatch in the 9 days of the jam.

Have fun.
We used the Godot Engine Version 3.1 alpha to build it.
